alert.note: Alert for Champaign; Vermilion (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 12 at 7:51AM CDT until June 12 at 8:15AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 AM CDT FOR WESTERN VERMILION AND EAST CENTRAL CHAMPAIGN COUNTIES... At 750 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over St. Joseph, or 10 miles east of Champaign, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... St. Joseph and Sidney around 755 AM CDT. Ogden around 805 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Homer. This includes Interstate 74 between mile markers 185 and 197. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
